alert.note: Alert for Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 22 at 12:56PM EDT until September 23 at 6:00AM EDT by NWS Key West
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT... * WHAT...Minor saltwater flooding. * WHERE...Upper and Middle Florida Keys. * WHEN...Through late tonight, and likely extending into Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Minor saltwater flooding of low elevation streets and lots is likely. Some storm drains will overflow, and some seawalls and docks will be overtopped. Boaters can expect less clearance under fixed bridges. Motorists should remember that persistent puddles around the times of high tide are almost certain to contain a mix of saltwater.
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Monroe Middle Keys; Monroe Upper Keys
